function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Neglecting local community adaptations in epidemic contexts","Impact":"Increased vulnerability and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Incorporate community adaptations into epidemiological models and public health strategies","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, social network analysis tools","People":"Local communities, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Public health agencies, local governments"},{"Description":"Rapid change in technology for ecosystem surveillance","Impact":"Inability to keep up with changing surveillance capabilities","Mitigation":"Invest in technology updates and training for surveillance personnel","Technologies":"Advanced surveillance technologies, data analytics tools","People":"Surveillance personnel, public health agencies","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Vulnerability as the level of exposure and sensitivity to VBDs minus adaptive capacity","Impact":"Increased risk of VBD impact on populations and systems","Mitigation":"Build adaptive capacities through education, training, and resource allocation","Technologies":"Educational resources, training programs, capacity building tools","People":"Populations at risk, public health agencies","Owner":"Government, public health agencies"}]}
